Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Pn-Imn with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a summarily modelled face with traced features, a collar and crossed arms in low relief with bracelets and holding hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Condition: good but cracked at waist level
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
